dublinCore.dc:title: 115 HR 3156 IH: To establish the Water Science Centers within the United States Geological Survey.
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Mr. Soto introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Natural Resources

form.official-title: To establish the Water Science Centers within the United States Geological Survey.

section.text: There are hereby established, within the United States Geological Survey, local Water Science Centers that shall collect and disseminate reliable, impartial, and timely information about the Nation's water resources.
